profiles:
Summary Data Scientist with 11 years experience in Econometrics, Statistics, Business Analytics, SPSS, R Problem solving and data analysis. In the data analytics area, strong industry experience in Supply Chain Analytics, Customer Analytics, Business Analysis, Requirements Gathering, consulting and Project management. 
- Creative, hands on executive of analytics with a proven track record of quickly unearthing information buried in vast amounts of data. 
- Demonstrated managerial and leadership skills in leading culturally diverse teams across different geographies. 
- Self motivated and result Oriented with strong interpersonal, communication and client management skills. 
 
Specialities: 
●	Data Mining Tools: R Programming, Python, SPSS, and WEKA. 
●	Python: NLTK, Pandas, Numpy, scipy packages. 
●	Statistical Tools: SPSS, R Programming, SAS Enterprise Miner. 
●	Solvers: Excel Open Solver and CPLEX. 
●	Front-end Visualization tools: Tableau, Microstrategy, Business Objects, Qlikview. 
●	Database and Data warehouse: Oracle, Teradata and Microsoft SQL Server. 
●	Programming: Java, python, SQL . 
●	Knowledge of Big data technologies such as Hadoop, Map reduce programming, Spark. 
●	ERP: SAP (OM and WM), SAP BW, MS Project, MS Office. 
●	Project Management: Agile Project management methods, develop burn-in charts, conduct daily cycle, sprint planning meeting, sprint review and sprint retrospective.
